mel: Melanoma is serious. Immediate dermatologist consultation required.
nv: Melanocytic nevi are mostly benign moles. Regular monitoring is recommended.
bcc: Basal cell carcinoma. Requires surgical removal or cryotherapy.
akiec: Actinic keratoses. Use topical creams or minor procedures.
df: Dermatofibroma. Typically benign and requires no treatment.
vasc: Vascular lesions. Consult for laser therapy if problematic.
